name: campaign-scheduler
description: Define and run campaign sequences for individual subjects better than anyone else!
author: Daniel Zambelli (https://danielzambelli.dk)

scripts.db: docker run --name cs_pg --rm -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=admin -p 8001:5432 -d postgres:latest && docker run --name cs_mysql --rm -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=admin -e MYSQL_DATABASE=db -e MYSQL_USER=admin -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=admin -p 8002:3306 -d mysql:latest && docker run --name cs_mariadb -d --rm -e MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD=admin -e MARIADB_DATABASE=db -p 8003:3306 mariadb:latest
scripts.db:stop: docker stop cs_pg && docker stop cs_mysql && docker stop cs_mariadb
scripts.test:all: npm run test:sqlite && npm run test:postgres && npm run test:mysql && npm run test:mariadb
